titles.title: Vulnerable Immigrant Voice Act

To amend section 292 of the Immigration and Nationality Act to require the Attorney General to appoint counsel for unaccompanied alien children and aliens with serious mental disabilities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security.

bill.summary:
3/26/2015--Introduced. Vulnerable Immigrant Voice Act
Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to require that counsel at the government's expense in a removal or related appeal proceeding shall be provided only for an alien who is: (1) an unaccompanied child, or (2) unable to represent himself or herself due to a serious mental disability.
